name: Truce Almighty
description:
Theme : Armistice

Truce Almighty

The two worlds have mutually signed and agreed upon a truce to stop the war. Although the armistice ended the fight but remember the war is merely halted not resolved. The Aliens have already planted time bombs in various parts of the world. Your task as an undercover Agent is to find and diffuse the bombs. 

The bombs are secured with a code. An encrypted color code will be helpful to decode and diffuse the bombs.

Created by WanderMind Labs
